Strings.Text: It is the door which leads to the \nTimegate. It is currently locked.{pause}
It's an automatic pilot for flying \nthe vehicle. There is no {pause}{clear}destination programmed. It won't \nstart until a destination has {pause}{clear}been entered.{pause}
{pic}The ship has arrived at the \njungle area.{delay 28732}
{pic}The ship has arrived at the 3rd \nEnergy Facility.{delay 28732}
Her eyes are trying to tell him \nsomething.{pause}
Probably remembering things \nabout his sister. He seems to {pause}{clear}have a grim look.{pause}
